RACE.RACE_TEXT: HORSESHOE INDIANAPOLIS RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 79. Allowance Purse 40000. FOR REGISTERED INDIANA BREDS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mil e Or Over Since July 19 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). If this race is taken off the turf, it will be run at 1 mile and 70 yards on the main track. (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DASH OF SIMPLICITY was well rated along the inside in the middle of the field throughout the first three eighths, then was moving up on the far turn to meet with the pace setter to battle in the early stretch, shook clear and kept on driving till the end. SKIPPINJUSTICE was unhurried early, then was well reserved on the backstretch, came out four wide leaving the far turn to surge down the lane and close belatedly in the end. STORMY WAGER set the pace into the first turn to lead the way down the backstretch, was met with an outer rival leaving the far turn to dueled in the early stretch then was out finished in the end. WILDCATJUSTICE chased the pace from the two path into the first turn and onto the backstretch, then rallied on the far turn and into the home stretch and was closing well. SIGNATURE STREET pressed the pace while two wide, was under a steady drive throughout the backstretch, then bid briefly on the far turn before flattening in the stretch. TAPERINEA chase the pace while three wide down the backstretch and in the middle of the field, then bid on the far turn and into the stretch while two wide and continued to close evenly in the stretch. SWIFT TEMPLE prompted the pace while three wide down the backstretch, then dropped back and bid from the two path throughout the far turn, was used up and tired in the stretch. AMERICA RULES settled along the inside early, came out five wide leaving the far turn and was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Skippinjustice
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, reserved bkstr, 4w 2nd, close belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Dash of Simplicity
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, duel 2w early, shook clear, driving

ENTRY.NAME: America Rules
ENTRY.OWNER: Clabar Mor Stables LLC and Haran Thoroughbreds LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Stormy Wager
ENTRY.OWNER: Al Bianchi Racing LLC Oringer Jay and BayTree Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, duel inside upper, out finished late

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcatjustice
ENTRY.OWNER: Lucky J Stables LLC Granitz Anthony J and Tonda Carlos
ENTRY.COMMENT: chase 2w, gamely far turn, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Signature Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: press 2w, driving far turn, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Taperinea
ENTRY.COMMENT: chase 3w, bid 2 wide far turn, even effort late

ENTRY.NAME: Swift Temple
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt 3w, drop back 2w 2nd, used up, tired stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HORSESHOE INDIANAPOLIS RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Special Weight Purse 36000. FOR REGISTERED INDIANA BREDS MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NONEOFYOURBUSINESS pressed the pace in the three path, bid at the quarter pole and drew off under mild urging. LILMORECRAKEN stalked the pace in the four path, bid five wide at the quarter pole but was no match. UNAFRADE raced in the four path and gained the show late. SHIPSHEWANA was clear early but gave way in the stretch. FORCE LUCKY pressed the early pace, bid at the three-eighths pole, then gave way in the stretch. WHAT ABOUT NOW was fractious in the gate, was off awkwardly, stalked the pace inside, then faded on the turn. LUCY THE GOOSE raced in the three path, then faded. WAR TRINKETS and PONTMETOTHEBOURBON were not factors.

ENTRY.NAME: Shipshewana
ENTRY.OWNER: Snyder Richard Snyder Connie Mast Thoroughbreds LLC and Gorham Marion F

ENTRY.NAME: Lilmorecraken
ENTRY.OWNER: Harpinator Racing LLC Tampatoga Racing LLC and Wilkes Tracey

ENTRY.NAME: Pontmetothebourbon
ENTRY.OWNER: Herrell, Ron D. and Reed, Brian

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HORSESHOE INDIANAPOLIS RACE 3 7 1/2F Turf CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. (PLUS UP TO 40% Indiana State Bred Supplement) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. If this race is taken off the turf, it will be run at 1 mile on the main track. (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VALUE ENGINEER angled in towards the rail to set the pace into the first turn, led the way down the backstretch under a steady hand ride, cleared the far turn and held sway in the home stretch to prove much the best. FINN AND BRENNAN saved ground throughout the first half, then was moving up gamely while five wide on the far turn to close willingly in the stretch but it wasn't enough. DEEP STRIKE chased the pace from the inside throughout the backstretch, then came out three wide on the far turn to rally in the stretch and closed well for the show prize. INTOLERABLE broke outwardly at the start then tracked the pace from the inside close behind the pace setter, then lost some ground throughout the far turn, rebid in the upper stretch and had more in the end. PLANET was bumped at the start then chased the pace while two wide down the backstretch, was urging steadily on the far turn from the four path, then bid in the stretch and needed more in the end. STELLAR VINO settled along the inside early, then bid on the far turn and was no threat. EXTRA HALO pressed the pace from the two path into the turn and down the backstretch, continued to hold the second position throughout the far turn under a strong drive, was extinguished and weakened in the stretch. CHEESESTEAK settled along the inside and no menace. SEKT settled at the back of the pack in the two path then continued to faded throughout and failed to rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Deep Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: chase inside, 3 wide 2nd, rallied stretch, close well

ENTRY.NAME: Stellar Vino
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, settled inside, bid 2nd, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Intolerable
ENTRY.OWNER: Ramos Juan O and Bug Thoroughbreds LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke inward, track in, drop bk 2nd, rebid stretch, had more late

ENTRY.NAME: Value Engineer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, cleared 2nd, held sway, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Finn and Brennan
ENTRY.OWNER: LaPenta Robert V e Five Racing Thoroughbreds and Madaket Stables LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Extra Halo
ENTRY.COMMENT: press 2w, held 2nd position to 1/4p, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HORSESHOE INDIANAPOLIS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 38000. FOR REGISTERED INDIANA BREDS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 19 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CLASSY DREAM dueled outside of the leader, bid in early stretch to be clear briefly, stepped out slightly at the sixteenth pole and was kept to task. BRODY MO stalked the pace, bid at the quarter pole in the three path and was steadied slightly at the sixteenth pole when the winner stepped out. V. E. TIA dueled inside of the winner and faded in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: V. E. Tia
ENTRY.OWNER: Southwest Racing Stables Inc and Murphy Bruce

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HORSESHOE INDIANAPOLIS RACE 5 5F Turf CR: 98. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 38000. (PLUS UP TO 40% Indiana State Bred Supplement) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $12,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, RESTRICTED OR INDIANA BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $40,000. Three Year Old s, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 19 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Races Where Entered For $30,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). If this race is taken off the turf, it will be run at 5 furlongs on the main tra ck. (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAL A KAZOO stalked the pace from the inside under a steady hand ride down the backstretch and into the turn, then dug in gamely in the early stretch and cruised to the wire to be up just in time. NEVER HAVE I EVER (IRE) set the pace from the inside, cleared the turn, was in a long drive heading into the stretch then was caught right at the wire and was second best. SPYCRAFT chased the pace while four wide, then came in to the three path to bid on the turn, menaced in the early stretch and closed well for third place. AWESOME AARON chased the pace while three wide, then bid on the turn and came up evenly in the stretch. TRIPLE ELVIS chased the pace while two wide into the turn, then rallied in the early stretch and needed more in the end. TRIPULANTE stalked the pace under a strong drive in the two path throughout then gave way in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Bal a Kazoo
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalk in, steady hand ride turn, gamely early, cruised, up late

ENTRY.NAME: Triple Elvis
ENTRY.COMMENT: chase 2w, rallied early stretch, need more

ENTRY.NAME: Never Have I Ever (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: RSR Racing Services LLC (Robert S Rhoads)
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, long drive, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Tripulante
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalk 2w, strong drive turn, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Spycraft
ENTRY.COMMENT: chase 4w, bid 3w turn, menaced upper, game 3rd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HORSESHOE INDIANAPOLIS RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Special Weight Purse 36000. FOR REGISTERED INDIANA BREDS MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHARGED LEGACY was clear early,vied inside, then bore out late. GOSPEL MUSIC pressed the pace in the three path bid at the three-eighths pole, then faltered while second best. MICKI VALENTINE bore out at the start and bumped a rival, stalked the pace in the four path but lacked a late bid. EVERLASTING SPIRIT bore in at the start, stalked the pace in the three path, then gave way on the turn. CHANNAH DEL MAR was bumped twice at the start, then saved ground. LA FLAKA was bumped at the start. BEST CUPCAKE pressed the early pace inside before giving way.

ENTRY.NAME: Best Cupcake
ENTRY.OWNER: Lunsford Bruce and Lauer Penny S

ENTRY.NAME: Gospel Music
ENTRY.OWNER: Siena Farm LLC and WinStar Farm LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Micki Valentine
ENTRY.OWNER: Nicks William A Spiess Stable LLC and Klopp Randy L

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HORSESHOE INDIANAPOLIS RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR REGISTERED INDIANA BREDS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLDS. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 19 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BROOKVILLE DEPUTY vied for the lead from the two path, emerged from the pack to duel with an outer rival throughout the turn, then kicked clear in the early stretch and held on well till the end. SHOOTER JUSTICE vied for the lead between rivals then pulled away to duel with BROOKVILLE DEPUTY on the turn, could not keep up with said rival and gave way in the stretch. BOLD BIZNESS vied for the lead with inner rivals and while five wide, then bid on the turn, dug in gamely in the early stretch and closed belatedly in the end. WHERE'S MOE was unhurried early at the back of the pack, then rallied in the late stretch along the rail to close well just missing third place in the end. KINGOFTHERAINBOW battled for the lead while four wide, was under a strong drive throughout the turn, was used up and gave way in the stretch. CIELO BLU settled back early behind the battling pack and was no menace. BROOKVILLE STORM vied from the inside early then flattened out after the three eighths and had no final bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Where's Moe
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, back of pack, rallied ins late, missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Brookville Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside early, thru after 3/8, no final bid

ENTRY.NAME: Brookville Deputy
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2w, duel inside turn, drew clear early, held well, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Shooter Justice
ENTRY.OWNER: Spiess Stable LLC and Klopp, Randy
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3w, duel 2 wide turn, gave way stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Cielo Blu
ENTRY.OWNER: TC Racing Stable (Jim Dauby) B and B Stables LLC and Red Shed Thoroughbred LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Kingoftherainbow
ENTRY.OWNER: Bad Boy Racing LLC and Thirstyacres Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 4w, driving turn, gave way late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HORSESHOE INDIANAPOLIS RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 38000. FOR REGISTERED INDIANA BREDS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 19 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOUBLEDOGJUSTICE pressed the pace in the two path, bid at the three-eighths pole, dueled to the wire and was kept to task. PAYNTER'S CANVAS led inside, dueled to the wire and was outfinished. AMAZING JUSTICE was jostled early, stalked the pace between foes, then had no late bid. SUNSIGN was unrushed early and improved position late. SOLAR POWER was jostled early, preseed the pace in the three path, then faded. BOULDER BAY stalked th early pace in the four path for a half mile before fading. SECRETO DE AMORE saved ground and then faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Solar Power
ENTRY.OWNER: Matthews Randy and Hixson Mark David

ENTRY.NAME: Amazing Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: jostled early,stalked btw foes,lacked late bid

RACE.FOOTNOTES: YNOT A HERO gallant effort, up wire. WAVING HER CORONA game effort, 2nd best. READI DUSTY all out rail, hung 3rd. TELLER MONTANA MRL rallied, missed 3rd. HAWKIN THE STRAW steady drive. IZA FAVORITE evenly. MC RAYNE even effort. JESS FIESTY bid, need more. SKYLINE SPIRIT broke inwardly, no rally. MR LIL BIT WAGON lacked bid.
